guideline.name: FDA PGx Association [Pharmacogenetic Associations for which the Data Support Therapeutic Management Recommendations]: Phenytoin - CYP2C9

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily C member 9

text.html: "May result in higher systemic concentrations and higher adverse reaction risk (central nervous system toxicity). Refer to FDA labeling for specific dosing recommendations. Carriers of CYP2C9*3 alleles may be at increased risk of severe cutaneous adverse reactions. Consider avoiding phenytoin as an alternative to carbamazepine in patients who are CYP2C9*3 carriers. Genotyping is not a substitute for clinical vigilance and patient management."
